On the exercise side, you could try incorporating activities that are lower-impact and don't leave you winded. Maybe you could try some light stretching or short walks instead of intense pacing. The goal is to give your body a chance to recover and build up your endurance over time.

It's not about "earning" or "deserving" certain things, it's about taking care of yourself.
